attributes.action: Stop non-essential shops from trading as click and collect during lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: Not is it only bring colleagues together during this lockdown that should be avoided but it is also encouraging the person collecting the item to not stay at home which could then lead to them going to various different shops while they have popped out once to collect their non-essential item. All the non-essential workers should be staying at home where possible to kill this virus off quicker. You can most items from the supermarkets and non-essential shops can wait.
attributes.background: To stop non-essential shops to stop click and collect. Most big companies are still trading online for home delivery and there shouldn’t be a need for colleagues to risk their lives and potentially spread the virus more for a non-essential shop for people to collect non-essential items

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567423
